import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../CSS/Footer.css"; import facebook from "../Img/facebook.png"; import twitter from "../Img/twitter (1).png"; import instagram from "../Img/instagram.png"; import youtube from "../Img/youtube.png"; import linkedin from "../Img/linkedin.png"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Footer = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [subscribed, setSubscribed] = useState(false); const handleEmailChange = (e) => { setEmail(e.target.value); }; const handleBackToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: "smooth" }); }; const handleSubscribe = () => { // Simulate a subscription process (you should replace this with a real backend call) console.log(`Subscribed with email: ${email}`); setSubscribed(true); setEmail(""); }; return (

); }; export default Footer;
